Chiyo uses [[chakra threads]] to control Sakura and dozens of [[kunai]] at the same time. Sakura runs at the opponent and Chiyo launches the kunai behind her, using Sakura to hide them from the opponent's view. At the last second, Sakura is pulled back by the threads, the opponent taking the shower of kunai. Then, Sakura jumps up high and comes down at the opponent preparing a [[Cherry Blossom Impact|chakra-enhanced punch]], Chiyo adding extra momentum by pulling her down with the strings. Finally, Sakura punches the opponent creating a gigantic crater.

[[pt-br:Marionete: Dança da Flor de Cerejeira]]
